data.name: Starlight Drifter - OST & Music Player
data.detailed_description:
This DLC Pack contains two items.

1. The Original Soundtrack by Sam L Jones.
2. An in-game Music Player

1. The Original Soundtrack


The complete original soundtrack for Starlight Drifter, created by Sam L. Jones.
  • 0. SLD - CL30IP
  • 1. Romance 1
  • 2. Romance 2
  • 3. Romance 3
  • 4. Romance 4
  • 5. Romance 5 80.111
  • 6. Sadness 1
  • 7. Sad 2
  • 8. Sexy 1
  • 9. Sexy 2
  • 10. Sensual Sexy 3
  • 11. Sensual Sexy 4
  • 12. Happiness 1
  • 13. Happiness 2
  • 14. Serene Happiness
  • 15. Happiness 4
  • 16. Adventure 1
  • 17. Adventure 2
  • 18. Adventure 3
  • 19. Adventure 4
  • 20. Free Comp
  • 21. Free Comp 2
  • 22. Free Comp 3
  • 23. Free 4
  • 24. Mystery - Tension 1
  • 25. Mystery 2

2. The In-Game Music Player


Once purchased and unlocked, this DLC adds the music player feature to the main menu of the game, this allows you to play and enjoy any of the songs from the original soundtrack of the game. As the game is in early access this feature is only available on the main menu and only includes the above track list. However as development continues this will be further augmented with additional tracks. We also aim to implement it into to 'in-game' menu to allow you to change tracks at will during the game as well.

Once purchased this item will automatically appear in the game.

data.short_description: The complete original 26 song soundtrack for Starlight Drifter and an in-game main menu music player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
